name: Interrogation by the state
description:
Hey, this is only a little prototyp I made for the "Learn something new Jam".

https://itch.io/jam/learn-something-new-jam

I wanted to learned the basics of GameMaker Studio 1.4 and the basics of PixelArt. The end result isn't great but I'm glad I could finish it :)

Don't expect anything :'D

Thank you for playing anyways :D

Normally I work as a writer and producer @SmokeSomeFrogs and making a game on my own was a totally new experience.
